name: code_postal_par_code
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bps.
Tool description: Les boîtes postales (BPs), codes postaux, localités,communes, codes cedex de Nouvelle-Calédonie.
API description: Fetches information associated with a given postal code in New Caledonia using the RapidAPI service.

code.description: The postal code for which to retrieve information.
